data.text: @Seasidesparks @Ithakas1 Absolutely! I hope you get the vaccine soon now that the Oxford's one has been approved too.

@MsMuffin2376 @Ithakas1 I work with SEN children some with complex health needs. I will be so relieved when I’m vaccinated. My fear has never been about my health but  that I could unknowingly bring the virus to school and the consequences    for our most clinically vulnerable children.
@Ithakas1 I agree and please teachers too!
